Html:
Hello,

I'm trying to setup Oxite on my local from source and I got a few errors when I ran the setup database scripts.

1. I ran Setup/Oxite.sql and it went well

2. I got a lot of errors when I try running "Oxite-Update-2009.01.05-to-2009.02.15.sql"

I made sure that I'm running as 'SA' account so there shouldn't be a problem with permission. Am I missing something here? Am I running the scripts in the right order?

Thank you very much, I appreciate your help.

Teera

There is no need to run that second script, that is only for people who already had a database using the schema from the January 5th release and need to update. The Oxite.sql is all you need for the most recent release.
